name: Aman Singh
tagline: Highly Experienced Illustrator and Graphics Designer
about: I am a Graphics designer based in Bangalore, India. I have 7+ experience of experience in designing logo, illustration and creative digital media.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.message: This review is long overdue but memories still vivid. It was a great experience getting my company logo.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.message: One of the best sellers here on Bluspec. Would look forward to work again with him.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.message: He is creative and the delivery was as expected. He exceeded my expectations in terms of deadline and was average at design quality. Will recommend him to anyone.
